content: ग्रस्त {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} [ग्रस् कर्मणि क्त] {@--1@} Eaten, devoured. {@--2@} Seized, stricken, affected, possessed; ग्रह°, विपद्°, जरा° <ls>U. 6. 39.</ls> {@--3@} Slurred; °मुक्तं <ls>U. 5. 13</ls>; °आमिषं <ls>Pt. 1. 193.</ls> {@--4@} Eclipsed. {@--5@} Taken, seized. --स्तं A word or sentence half-uttered or slurred over.
